dcterms:description: The dataset is collected from the /r/ChangeMyView subreddit, focusing on arguments from root reply. It consists of 3,456 training instances and 807 testing instances, where each instance includes an original post with one positive and one negative reply.
dcterms:title: CMV Dataset
